# UIPointerShape.horizontalBeam(length:)

**Case**

The pointer morphs into a horizontal beam using the specified length.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontalBeam(length: CGFloat)
```

## Specifying pointer shapes

- **UIPointerShape.verticalBeam(length:)**: The pointer morphs into a vertical beam using the specified length.
- **UIPointerShape.path(_:)**: The pointer morphs into the given Bézier path.
- **UIPointerShape.roundedRect(_:radius:)**: The pointer morphs into a rounded rectangle using the provided corner radius.
